annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see §§ 902 to 908 of the Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-438, October 20, 2000, 47 DCR 8740).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Pursuant to subsection (f) of this section, this section expired on September 30, 2002.
